member.name: T:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration
member.summary: Runtime setting logic for the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para: This class is used to set the runtime configurations for the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.TngnVersion
member.summary: The Tingen Web Service version.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.TngnBuild
member.summary: The Tingen Web Service build.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.TngnSystemCode
member.summary: The Tingen Web Service System Code.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.TngnMode
member.summary: The Tingen Web Service mode.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.MachineName
member.summary: The name of the machine running the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.DateStamp
member.summary: The current date.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.TimeStamp
member.summary: The current time.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.RequiredDirectories
member.summary: Directories required by the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para: Directories are locations on the file system where files and folders are stored.

The Tingen Web Service requires the following directories to be present in the ./AppData directory:
Runtime Runtime data.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.RequiredFiles
member.summary: Files required by the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service requires the following files to be present in the ./AppData/Runtime directory:
tngn.build The Tingen Web Service build information.
tngn.mode The Tingen Web Service mode.
tngn.systemcode The Avatar System Code that the Tingen Web Service will interface with.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.ValidSystemCodes
member.summary: The list of valid System Codes.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service will only interface with the following Avatar System Codes:
LIVE The Avatar production environment
UAT The Avatar testing environment

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.ValidTngnModes
member.summary: The list of valid Tingen Web Service modes.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service can have one of the following modes:
DISABLED The Tingen Web Service does not do any work.
ENABLED The Tingen Web Service functions normally.
PASSTHROUGH The Tingen Web Service writes log files, but does not make any modifications to data.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.Summary
member.summary: A summary of the runtime settings for exporting.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Load the runtime settings for the Tingen Web Service.
member.returns: Runtime settings for the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration.AreValid(Outpost31.Core.Runtime.RuntimeConfiguration)
member.summary: Verify the Tingen Web Service settings.

member.name: T:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.Spin
member.summary: Startup/shutdown logic for the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para: This method contains two methods that startup/shutdown the Tingen Web Service:

This class doesn't do much actual work, and should remain fairly static. For the
most part, it just hands information to Outpost31, where the heavy lifting is done.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.Spin.Up(Outpost31.Core.Session.TngnSession,System.String,ScriptLinkStandard.Objects.OptionObject2015,System.String)
member.summary: Spin up a new Tingen Web Service session.
member.param: The (empty) Tingen Web Service session object.
The Tingen Web Service current version.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.Spin.Down
member.summary: Spin down the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: T:Outpost31.WelcomeToOutpost31
member.summary: A place for Outpost31 details and stuff.

remarks.para:
Outpost31 is the back-end logic for the Tingen web service.
This class is just a placeholder for documentation, and where the Outpost31 version number is
updated (see the header above).
While you're here, take a look at this stuff:
The Tingen Documentation
Uh...I guess that's it. Thanks for stopping by!
